job_tasks.phrase: Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application (Python, Generative AI models, Ray, FastAPI), that interfaces with the back-end.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of building a software application, including its architecture and integration with other components.

job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for developing and implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and models to solve complex problems.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the development and implementation of ML algorithms and models, which is the core of 'Modeling'.

job_tasks.phrase: A key role in developing our software solution, involved with important technical decisions.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights involvement in the overall software development process and decision-making, a key aspect of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve, extend and benchmark key functionalities of our software solution.
job_tasks.justification: Improving and extending functionalities are typical software development tasks focused on enhancing an existing solution.

job_tasks.phrase: Identify and implement new features for improving our software solution.
job_tasks.justification: Identifying and implementing new features is a fundamental software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Actively participate in technical strategy sessions with respect to the development of our solution.
job_tasks.justification: Participating in strategy sessions indicates involvement in aligning technical development with broader business and solution goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with Docker and CI/CD practices.
job_tasks.justification: Docker and CI/CD are core components of MLOps and operations engineering for deploying and managing software.

job_tasks.phrase: Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application (Python, Generative AI models, Ray, FastAPI)
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Generative AI models' directly points to work involving modeling in the generative AI space.

soft_skills.phrase: An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
A startup mindset and ambition to work in a startup environment.
Ability to become proficient with our solution quickly and understand our products' technical capabilities.

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions building applications with 'Generative AI models' and using frameworks like Ray and FastAPI. It emphasizes developing and implementing ML algorithms, improving software functionalities, and participating in technical strategy, all core aspects of a GenAI Engineer role focused on productionizing generative AI solutions.
